name: Bird Mayhem
description:
Bird Mayhem is a game all about birds, small birds, big birds, tall birds short birds.

Your goal is to collect as much bird seed as possible and cause mayhem on the humans. Become the most powerful bird, scare off the competition and most importantly, collect bird seed. Choose from a selection of different birds, each with their own unique abilities and style.

Objective:

Collect bird seed and avoid other unfriendly birds that may cross your path. Use chips and other items to upgrade your attacks and try not to die.

Controls:

Arrow keys - to move, up, down, left, right

Space - Honk/ shoot

R - Restart Game

This game is inspired by 2D shooters, side scrolling games and Beat em ups. This is a project created for a game design course and utilise different aspects of 2D games in Unity.

The game is in the prototype stages (as well as first game in Unity.) as there are many parts that will be added if the project moves forward. - Current place holder for enemy is a Multi coloured bird - WARNING on mild flashing lights.

All assets and artwork drawn by me. Font is not mine and is called "Easter bird."

Please feel free to leave your thoughts and feedback on the game, this would be much appreciated.
